mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Order_tb(order_num, user_num, order_date, total_account, order_state, order_address, delivery_type, delivery_num) VALUES(#{order_num}, #{user_num}, sysdate(), #{total_account}, #{order_state}, #{order_address},#{delivery_type},#{delivery_num})

INSERT INTO OrderList_tb(order_num, user_num, product_num, order_count, now_price) SELECT DISTINCT o.order_num AS order_num, o.user_num AS user_num, c.product_num AS product_num, c.product_count AS product_count, o.total_account AS toal_account FROM Order_tb o, Cart_tb c WHERE o.user_num = #{user_num} AND o.user_num = c.user_num AND o.delivery_num = c.delivery_num
mapper.select: SELECT ol.order_num AS order_num, ol.product_num AS product_num, p.product_name AS product_name, count(ol.order_num) AS orderList_count, o.order_date AS order_date, o.delivery_type AS delivery_type, ol.now_price AS now_price FROM OrderList_tb ol, Order_tb o, Product_tb p WHERE ol.user_num=#{user_num} and ol.order_num = o.order_num and ol.user_num = o.user_num and ol.product_num = p.product_num GROUP BY ol.order_num

SELECT o.order_num AS order_num, o.product_num AS product_num, p.product_name AS product_name, order_count FROM OrderList_tb o, Product_tb p WHERE user_num = #{user_num} AND order_num = #{order_num} AND o.product_num=p.product_num
